description: Number of 0's in binary representation of n-th prime.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (PARI) A035103(n) = #(n=binary(prime(n)))-norml2(n) [From _M. F. Hasler_, Nov 21 2009](Haskell)a035103 = a023416 . a000040  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 19 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
